title: National Research Program
desc: Research and design to enhance the experience of participating in a national research program.
alt: A dashboard for participants in a reasearch study, with an illustration of people adding data to a research machine.

title: Diabetes Treatment Tools
desc: Software to support the management of diabetes treatments over the continuum of care.
alt: Continuum of care in diabetes treatment

title: A Digital IRB
desc: An in-depth usability study and redesign of the IRB system for one of the largest hospital systems in the US.
alt: Jennifer working on cataloguing components and styles from a wall of designs

title: Inspired EHRs: Designing for Clinicians
desc: An open-source e-book to encourage and inspire the wider use of human factors thinking in designing tools for clinicians.
alt: A photo of the Inspired EHRs book
client: Jeff Belden, MD, the University of Missouri, funded by the National Institute of Health, and California Health Care Foundation
